Wisdom: أَعْلَمُ النَّاسِ بِاللَّهِ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَهُ مَسْأَلَةً
enWisdom: The person who is most learned about Allah is he who asks from Him the most

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ سَطَوَاتٍ وَنَقِمَاتٍ فَإِذَا نَزَلَتْ [أُنْزِلَتْ‏] بِكُمْ فَادْفَعُوهَا بِالدُّعَاءِ فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَدْفَعُ الْبَلَاءَ إِلَّا الدُّعَاءُ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, has wraths and chastisements, so if [any of] it descends upon you, repel it with supplication; for indeed nothing can repel tribulation except supplication
When you embark on something, seek what is best from it
Whoever asks Allah, He grants to him

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَأْذَنَ عَلَى اللَّهِ أَذِنَ لَهُ
enWisdom: Whoever seeks permission from Allah, He grants it [to him]

Wisdom: مَا مِنْ شَيْ‏ءٍ أَحَبَّ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ مِنْ أَنْ يُسْأَلَ
enWisdom: There is nothing more beloved to Allah, the Glorified, than being beseeched

Wisdom: مَا الْمُبْتَلَى الَّذِي قَدِ اشْتَدَّ بِهِ الْبَلَاءُ أَحْوَجَ إِلَى الدُّعَاءِ مِنَ الْمُعَافَى الَّذِي لَا يَأْمَنُ الْبَلَاءَ
enWisdom: The one who is afflicted by severe tribulation is no more in need of supplication than the one who is doing well but is not secure from tribulations

Wisdom: أَعْجَزُ النَّاسِ مَنْ عَجَزَ عَنِ الدُّعَاءِ
enWisdom: The most incapable of all people is the one who is unable to supplicate
